sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky has arrived in Saudi Arabia in his latest leg of international travel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: China's President Xi Jinping unveils a grand plan for development in the region as its Central Asian Summit in the city of Xi'an drew to a close.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Zelensky has arrived in Saudi Arabia to attend the Arab League Summit where he will address leaders who have remained largely neutral on Russia's invasion of his country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Many still maintain warm ties with Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The visit comes amid a whirlwind of international travel by the Ukrainian leader who until now has mostly visited allied countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Taking to social media, Zelensky said Saudi Arabia could play a significant role concerning Russia's full-scale invasion, adding that further cooperation could take bilateral relations to a new level.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Saudi Arabia pledged €370 million in aid to Ukraine earlier this year and has voted in favour of UN resolutions calling on Russia to end its invasion and refrain from annexing Ukrainian territory the Saudis have even offered to mediate between Ukraine and Russia following a prisoner exchange deal they brokered last year President Zelensky is due to attend the g7 summit of world leaders in Hiroshima Japan on Sunday the aftermath of yet another night of Russian attacks, the ninth this month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Kyiv says it shot down 29 of the 30 missiles launched by Moscow in the airstrikes, but there had been some damage from falling debris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As the unprecedented wave of attacks continued, eight cruise missiles were fired over the southern port city of Odessa, with one person killed and two wounded in the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Kiev also said it's repaired the Patriot air defense system, damaged in an attack on Tuesday, despite Russian claims that it had been destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukraine however claims to have successfully hit all assigned targets in the nighttime high-precision missile strikes, destroying significant stockpiles of Ukrainian forces' weapons and ammunition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Speaking in Lisbon, NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg has welcomed the announcement by allies that they will provide cruise missiles and train Ukrainian pilots to use Western fighter jets. He says he expects the alliance to commit to spending 2% of their GDP on defense at its next summit in July. As the G7 summit focuses on a perceived threat from Beijing's growing influence,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Chinese President Xi Jinping unveiled a grand plan for Central Asia's development.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The parallel two-day gathering in Xi'an with leaders from five Central Asian countries wrapped up on Friday, with President Xi taking a swipe at the West's attempts to deter Beijing's economic and political developments. China wants to boost its trade with the region by promising state-of-the-art highways and railway lines, as well as speeding up construction of pipelines to supply gas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It wants to take on a new leadership role in the region that has traditionally been a Russian sphere of influence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Central Asian summit was attended by leaders from Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Leaders of the G7 group of major economies laying down wreaths at the Hiroshima Peace Memorial Museum as the crucial three-day summit gets underway in Japan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The city was victim to the first atomic bomb attack during World War II, and this memorial serves as a reminder of the horrors of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As meetings get underway, Ukrainian officials say President Volodymyr Zelensky will attend the gathering in person.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: With the war in Ukraine on top of the agenda, he's expected to ask US President Joe Biden and other leaders to reaffirm their support for his country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Group of Seven has already pledged more sanctions against Russia, as well as promising a united front against China's assertive foreign policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, hundreds of demonstrators took to the streets of Hiroshima to denounce the three-day gathering. They held up banners damning what they described as the imperialist summit, along with other anti-war messages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But the war in Ukraine is not the only topic on the agenda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: France says it will use the opportunity to address the climate crisis and artificial intelligence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A helicopter hovers over the flooded streets of a town in Emilia-Romagna

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: as rescue workers evacuate yet another person from their home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some 20,000 people have been left homeless in the northern region with 41 towns and villages destroyed by water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The death toll from the floods has risen to 13, but several people are still missing after torrential rains pushed rivers and tributaries to burst their banks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We have never seen a job like this in so many years. Have you ever seen it?

sentences.sentence: No, not in Lugo.

sentences.sentence: Le persone in dispera, i loro abitanti, le loro farmacologie e l'infrastruttura sono sotto l'acqua.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: La più catastrofica affluttazione che ha avuto l'Italia in 100 anni.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Anche se le fiume hanno stoppato, i sistemi di suoi sono saturati e l'acqua continua a soffrire. Sewage systems are saturated and water continues to overflow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said stability and economic security are at stake as the country prepares to vote in its general election on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In his penultimate speech, Mitsotakis from the ruling centre-right New Democracy Party hit out at the leader of the left-wing opposition Syriza party, Alexis Tsipras. Ο αθεόφοβος δικαιοσύνη παντού. Παντού εκτός από δίπλα του, όπου έχει το καταδικασμένο 13-0 στο ειδικό δικαστήριο Νίκο Παπά.

sentences.sentence: Το ερώτημα της κυριακής είναι από τώρα μπροστά μας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Με λίγα λόγια, προτιμάμε κυβέρνηση Νέας Δημοκρατίας και Πρωθυπουργό Μητσοτάκη, κυβέρνηση ΣΥΡΙΖΑ και Πρωθυπουργό Τσίπρα.

Χωρίς μνημόνια, χωρίς καταναγκασμούς, χωρίς την Τρόικα, χωρίς το Σόιμπλε, χωρίς όλους αυτούς που μας επέβαλαν την πολιτική τους.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Speaking on the sidelines of the Russia-Islamic World Kazan Forum, Deputy Foreign Minister Mikhail Bogdanov said Moscow is ready to provide warring parties with a platform for negotiations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: After more than one month of fighting between the Sudanese army and the rapid support forces paramilitary group, the UN says the country needs 2.7 billion euros in emergency aid.

sentences.sentence: Police have arrested a driver with apparent psychiatric problems who managed to speed through one of the main gates into the Vatican City on Thursday night.

sentences.sentence: The driver drove past Swiss guards into the palace courtyard, despite Vatican gendarme firing a shot into the vehicle's front tires the Vatican press office described the suspect as around 40 years old and in a serious state of psychophysical alteration he is being held in the Vatican small jail for medical examination and the Roark basest of the Smith, one of the most influential British bands of the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Since his debut in the competition nearly 20 years ago, tennis heavyweight Rafael Nadal hasn't missed a Roland-Garros tournament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This year, for the first time, he will have to watch from the sidelines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Spaniard, the current French Open title holder, has won the tournament a record 14 times and says he is pulling out because of a lingering hip injury.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And in more shock news, Nadal, who turns 37 next month, also announced that next year could be the final season of his career.
